content.question: Which of the following consequences of the 2018 Russian presidential election is represented by the data in the table?

choices.label: The Russian constitution will again need to be revised to allow for another term in office for Putin.
Putin was re-elected with high voter turnout, which strengthens his legitimacy.
The United Russia Party will dominate the legislature and undermine rule of law in Russia.
Only the top three candidates will have representation in the Duma because the other parties failed to cross the five-percent threshold.

content.answer: Putin was re-elected with high voter turnout, which strengthens his legitimacy.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
